author: RTÉ News
title: Point of contagion: Mass gatherings and the coronavirus
description: Congregations of a secretive South Korean sect, an assembly of French evangelists and major European football matches: as the new coronavirus radiated across the planet it seeded clusters of infections at mass gatherings that helped magnify its spread.
content:
